softwares.description: RHEL is a Linux distribution developed by Red Hat and targeted toward the commercial market.

softwares.description: Ubuntu Server brings economic and technical scalability to your datacentre, public or private.

provisionSchemaForm.schema: {"type":"object","properties":{"componentName":{"title":"Server Name","type":"string","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\-]+$","maxLength":15,"validationMessage":"Length must be 1-15 and Alphanumeric, underscore, and hyphen","default":"capeserver"},"tenant":{"title":"Tenant ID","type":"string","default":"85c997b9-f494-46b3-a11d-772983cf6f11"},"subscription":{"title":"Subscription ID","type":"string","default":"7b649da9-04a2-4abe-9285-f9fb62bbfa60"},"client":{"title":"Client ID","type":"string","default":"6b171dbc-aa16-44eb-b68a-f8edf09c1292"},"clientSecret":{"title":"Client Secret","type":"string","default":""},"resourceGroup":{"title":"Resource Prefix","type":"string","pattern":"^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$","maxLength":80,"validationMessage":"Length must be 1-80 and Alphanumeric, dash, underscore, and period","default":"capeserver-123456"},"vmSize":{"title":"VM Size","type":"string","default":"Standard_A0","enum":["Standard_A0","Standard_A1","Standard_A2","Standard_A3","Standard_A4","Standard_A5","Standard_A6","Standard_A7","Standard_D1","Standard_D2","Standard_D3","Standard_D4","Standard_D11","Standard_D12","Standard_D13","Standard_D14","Standard_F1","Standard_F2","Standard_F4","Standard_F8","Standard_F16"]},"osVer":{"title":"OS version","type":"string","default":"14.04.5-LTS","enum":["12.04.5-LTS","14.04.5-LTS","15.10","16.04.0-LTS"]},"adminUsername":{"title":"User Name","type":"string","pattern":"^(?!adm$)(?!admin$)(?!audio$)(?!backup$)(?!bin$)(?!cdrom$)(?!crontab$)(?!daemon$)(?!dialout$)(?!dip$)(?!disk$)(?!fax$)(?!floppy$)(?!fuse$)(?!games$)(?!gnats$)(?!irc$)(?!kmem$)(?!landscape$)(?!libuuid$)(?!list$)(?!lp$)(?!mail$)(?!man$)(?!messagebus$)(?!mlocate$)(?!netdev$)(?!news$)(?!nobody$)(?!nogroup$)(?!operator$)(?!plugdev$)(?!proxy$)(?!root$)(?!sasl$)(?!shadow$)(?!src$)(?!ssh$)(?!sshd$)(?!staff$)(?!sudo$)(?!sync$)(?!sys$)(?!syslog$)(?!tape$)(?!tty$)(?!users$)(?!utmp$)(?!uucp$)(?!video$)(?!voice$)(?!whoopsie$)(?!www-data$)[a-zA-Z0-9_\\-]+$","maxLength":64,"validationMessage":"Length must be 1-64 and User name cannot contain reserved words or special characters \\/\"\"[]:|<>+=;,?*@ or end with '.'","default":"capeuser"},"adminPassword":{"title":"Password","type":"string","pattern":"^(?=.*\\d)(?=.*[!@#$%^&*-_+=[\\]{}|:.,.?/`~.();])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]).{6,64}$","validationMessage":"Length must be 6-64 and Alphanumeric, underscore, and hyphen. Password must have 3 of the following: 1 lower case character, 1 upper case character, 1 number, and 1 special character.","default":""},"provider":{"type":"string","default":"Azure"},"osName":{"type":"string","default":"Ubuntu"}},"required":["componentName","subscription","tenant","client","clientSecret","location","deploymentName","vmSize","osVer","adminUsername","adminPassword","provider"]}

softwares.description: Windows Server is a brand name for a group of server operating systems released by Microsoft.
